oneShot: Your eyes slowly focus as you awaken, your head pounding, blood rushing through your ears.
You struggle to recolect the events leading up to this point.
description: The loud hum of electrical machinery is

exits.name: NORTH
exits.description: An organic looking corridor snakes away from you to the 'north', curving out of sight.

exits.name: SOUTH
exits.description: Behind you, to the south, are rolling fields and the way back home.
